page.description: GetSecurityApplication retrieves the properties of a security application.
page.prototype: .GetSecurityApplication as L (BYREF SecurityApplication as P, SecurityApplicationName as C)

argument.name: BYREF SecurityApplication
argument.description: A variable to return the security application object into.

argument.name: SecurityApplicationName
argument.description: The name of the security application to retrieve.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
